title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: The bus stop, morning. The boys are dreassed in Union blue. Stan bears the flag, Kyle and Kenny have fifes, and Cartman carries a drum.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hey, dude. Do you like to rock?!  Yes, I like to rock! Helloo, Baltimore!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Cartman, what the hell are you doing?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I'm playing the drum.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Well, you have to hit it softer!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: You can't just "hit" a drum, you have to beat the shit out of it!  Shut you butthole, or I'll kick your ass, you fuckin' drum!!  That's how you rock, dude.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: You're not supposed to rock, you're supposed to keep the beat!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I ma keepin' the beat; your flute-playing sucks!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: That's it, Cartman, you can't be the drummer!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Ey, I'll get it!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Dude, the Civil War reenactment is tomorrow! You're not gonna get it by tomorrow!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yes I will!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Alright alright. Let's just try it again. 1-2-3-4.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Go!!! Does Cleveland like to rock?! Go!!! Yes, damnit!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Cartman!!!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: What?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Give me the drum, and you play the flute

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: No way! Flutes are totally gay!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: (Oh. Flutes are gay?)

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Cartman, I'm the leader of the Reenactment Fife and Drum Squad, and I say you play the flute!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Oh! Well, you know what I say?!  Screw you guys, I'm going home!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: You dick!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Later.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Alrighty everyone. We just have a few things to go over before we head out to the reenactment battlefield.  First of all, I have great news. There are over 200 folks from around the state that have come to see this year's reenactment, and that's the best turnout ever!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yes! Woohoo, yea!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Where the hell is Cartman? If he misses the orientation, they're not gonna lethim in the reenactment.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: He'll show.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: He'd better!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I'm also very proud to announce that this year's alcohol sponsor, Jagermin's S'more-flavored Schnapps, the schnapps with the delightful taste of s'mores.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Whoa. Mmm.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Mmm. It does taste like s'mores.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hih yeah, and it's got quite a kick, too.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: And now, to clarify how the reenctment should unfold, let's bring up our master historian, Grnandpa Marvin Marsh,  the only man old enough to have actually seen the Civil War... reenactment of 1924.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Wow, dude! Your granpa still isn't dead?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Dude, that's not cool.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Good morning, gentlmen.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Cartman, what the hell are you doing?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Teah! You're dressed up like the South.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yes. This year, I've decided to fight for the glorious South. Screw you guys, home. And may I say that we're going to whup your ass this time.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: You can't just come to a Civil War reenactment dressed up like General Lee, fatass!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Oh, really? I'm pretty sure I just did.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Okay, you all know the rules. You must fire your blanks into the air, and if someone says they killed ya, you gotta play dead.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: The South loses this battle, Cartman. They lose the war!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Nuh uhn, the South is gonna win.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: No they're not, stupid!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yes we are!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: How much do you wanna bet?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Now remember, everybody: for a good reenactment we've got to pretend down to the last detail that we're really in the Civil War. So when the North wins, all of us on the Confederate side should act all bummed and depressed.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Come on, Cartman! How much do you wanna bet the South doesn't win?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Well, this war is about slavery, so how about if the South wins, you two assholes have to be my slaves for a month.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: And if the North wins you're our slave for a month??

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Right.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: You're on!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Then I shall bid you good morning, gentlemen, and see you on the battlefield.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hoohoo what a d'humbass!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeahah. He doesn't even know that the South loses the Civil War.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: It's gonna be rad having Cartman be our slave.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: ...And with that, let's all go to Tamarack Hill and put on a good show!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yes! Woohoo, yea!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: "TAMARACK HILL," 9 00 A.M. The Reenactment. Bleachers flank Grandpa on either side as the North and the South face off before him. Each side has set up its camp

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Welcome to the South Park reenactment of the Battle of Tamarack Hill. The men in gray are the Confederacy, fron the South ; in blue are the Union, from the North .

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: It was a cold morning in 1862. The Union Army had to get the bell of Appmattox down from Tamarack Hill. What ensued was a bloody battle, but after many hours, the Union Army prevailed. Here now is the reenactment of that great battle.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Forward!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Let's bring those Confederate bastards down!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Fire!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Alright men, fire!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hey, uh, I shot you, Ned. You have to fall down.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Ow.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeh-hah!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Oh, so this is what it was like.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hey! What's that guy doing?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yippie! Long live the Confederacy!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Huh? Wha-?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: What the hell?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: He took the bell!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: He can't do that!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: The Confederacy doesn't take the bell!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hooray for the South!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Cartman, you can't do that!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: God damnit! Now we have to start over!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: 10 24 A.M., reenactment - second attempt.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Alrighty everyone.  We're going to do the entire reenactment again, because of some confusion over the bell. Now, I know you're just trying to help, Eric, but we have to let the Union capture the bell this time.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: But why? Why should they get the bell?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Wuh. Well, 'cause we're supposed to lose.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: But we don't have to lose.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: What??

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Gentlemen, we can win this battle! Sure, we could lose, and tonight we can go back to our families and say, "We did it! We lost like we were supposed to! Aren't we proud?!" Or, or we take that hill. We take that hill, and when we stand tall upon it, we hold our heads high, and we yell, "Not this year! This year belongs to the Confederaseh!"

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: By God, he's right!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Jimbo!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah, I've been reenacting this war for 22 years now. And for 22 years us Confederate reenacters have had to spend the evening being ridiculed and made fun of by the Union reenacters! Well, I'm sick of it!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah! Why do we have to be their bitches every year?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I'm tired of losing this battle!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: And I say it's high time we kicked some ass! Who's with me?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: The battlefield

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Alright, folks. Sorry for the false start. We're ready to go again. It was a cold morning in 1862. The Union Army had to-

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yaaaaah!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Come on! Just give up! We're not gonna let you live another day!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Uh, what are they doing?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: You Yankee sons of bitches!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Ow! That hurt!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: God damnit, what the hell are they doing?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: What do we do?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Run for your life, dude!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: God bless those men that fight for their freedom. God bless those men! And God bless the Confederasah!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Come on!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Oh?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Surrender your men, general!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Jimbo, have you lost your mind?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: SURRENDER YOUR MEN, GENERAL!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Alright, alright. We surrender.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
role: Barbrady	[in the stands] The South win?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: The South wins!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah, woohoo!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: God damnit!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Well, we can all be friends now.  Come on, Randy. Have some s'more schnapps.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Uh, I can't be happy. You ruined the reenactment.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Aw, come on. Have a little sip.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: So, you guys about ready to start being my slaves yet?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: You cheated, Cartman!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah, but it doesn't matter, because the bet was that the South doesn't win the war! And the South still didn't win the war, dipshit!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah. Too bad you're such a dumbass in history, or you would have known that!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I hate you guys so much. So very very much. And this is not over. Not by a long shot.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: All I'm saying is that... is is that the Confederates would have just gotten their asses kicked in Topeka!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: That ain't true! The Confederates would have shupped ass in Topeka, too!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: You're dreaming!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Perhaps we should take Topeka.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Huh?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: They mock us in Kansas, soldier. They think the South is a joke. They don't respect our authoritah.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: They don't?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: No. I say we take Topeka.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: You know what? I'll bet we could take Topeka right now and clear them all around!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Huh?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: That's right! Maybe we should do what the Confederates would've done and march on to Topeka!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I'll bet we could!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I'll bet we could, too!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I'll bet you can't.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: What?!  Is that a challenge?! I'll bet we can!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I'll bet you can't, because you guys are all pussies!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Pussies?! Oh yeah?! Men! It's time to show the world what the Confederate Army has got! We're gonna take Topeka once and for all!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: All o' you men. You may have lost in the Union today, but join us now and win back your pride!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Well, the Union be damned!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Let's go!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Oh! What was our bet again? Let's see... Yes, I remember. If the South wins you have to be my slaves for a month.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: They're just drunk, Cartman! As soon as they sober up, they'll stop.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yes. E-e-enjoy your freedon, gentlemen. Soon, you will be my properteh. Come, Kenny. Come fight for us, and I'll make sure you get lots of plunder and womens.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: (Woohoo!)

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: TOPEKA, KANSAS, 7 53 A.M., next morning. A rooster crows. The town goes about its business. A mailman delivers some mail. A woman opens the school door. A traffic cop directs traffic. Two kids play catch in front of the school. The woman returns with the flag and hoists it up on the flagpole, and the mailman drops by.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Oh good morning, Mrs. Hollis.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hello, Ralph.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Did you happen to catch that ball gamem last night?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I'm afraid I was grading papers pretty late and-

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: What's that noise, officer?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah! Yeah!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Ccchhhhaaaarrrrggggeeee!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Randy knocks Ralph down with the butt of his gun. Gerald tackles Mrs. Hollis. Another man prepares a Molotov cocktail and throws in into a house, then salutes the resulting fire. Jimbo and Med head for the church, and its congregants rush out screaming. Stuart aims at the officer and shoots him

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Ow!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Freeze, buddy. These are blanks, but they still hurt like hell!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: It's ours, it's ours! We've taken Topeka!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Alright, Yank, tell us where you keep your Jagermin's S'more-flavored Schnapps?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Uh-uh-uh schnapps? Uhm, uh-uh-I guess that would be at the liquor store.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: WHERE?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: At the liquor store, at the liquor stohohohohore!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Come on, boys!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: This is the most bizarre thing I've ever seen.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Excuse meh.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: South Park. Stan and Kyle wait at a regular bus stop

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Dude, my mom is sooo pissed at my dad for going to Kansas.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I know, butÂ—why do they have to take it out on us? Why do we have to wait around for them to come back?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Oh here comes the bus.  Butters? Are you the only one that came back?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Uh, conuh-  Confederate Messenger Butters reporting, sir. I have a message for you from the battlefield.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: What battlefield?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Uh Topeka. We're raisin' all kids of hell, see?  Eh, it's probably the most fun I've had in several months. Wuwell, you gonna read your message or not?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Dear guys.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: God damnit, that fat piece of shit!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Dude! What if Cartman really does succeed? And we really do have to be his slaves??

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: That would suck so much ass.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: We have to stop him, dude.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I'll go get my grandpa. He'll help us. Where's the Confederate Army now, Butters?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Uh-uh, wuh-I ain't supposed to tell you that. If I told you that, well, why I'd be a, a no-good Yankee son of a bitch.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: We'll give you 10 bucks.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Oh. O-oh, okay.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: News Report

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: ...And she was forced to live off her own feces for several days. In national news,  a frightening radical group from Colorado is making its way across the Southern states of Aemrica.  The group is recruiting new members in every town they pass through, and rapidly growing in number.  So authorities have decided to call in the National Guard. The groups seems to be led by military mastermind and right-wing radical Jimbo Kern , who is known for his guerilla-fighting and leadership skills.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Somewhere...

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Give me some more s'more schnapps! I'm gonna be sick.  Blouach.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Oh, boy. This is worse than I thought.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Well, comem on Billy, we've gotta make these little peckers stop before they get themselves killed.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Aaaaa!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: They say you can either fight them or join them.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Well I'm joining them. Those blanks hurt!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Dad, Dad.  Mom wants you to come home.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Not now, uh Stan, I'm pillaging.  Get over here!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: You've got to stop, Dad. If the South wins, me and Stan have to be Cartman's slaves!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: This is a reenactment, Kyle. My name is Pvt. John Fugasol, and I have to do what my general tells me!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hey! There's some more schnapps over here!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: More schnapps!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I'm Sgt. Larsen of the National Guard. We're here to stop the terrorists.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: They're not terrorists, they're just a bunch of drunk wankers from Colorado.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Well, we can't just shoot 'em; there's innocents and children about. Dawkins!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Sir!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Fire a warning flare!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yes sir!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Medic!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Woops.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Oh, my God! They killed Kenny!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: You bastards!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hey!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: We can't fire at them, sir. There are too many children.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Then how do we stop them?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I know! But we'll have to wait until dark.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: South Park, Kenny's house, morning. Mrs. McCormick comes out to pick up the day's mail. She finds a letter, opens it, and reads... The sepia image of Cartman returns

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Dear Ms. McCormick

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
role: It is with a very heavy heart that I must inform you that your
text: son Kenny was killed in battle [her brows rise in surprise] on the morning of November 18, at Ruby Hills Funland in Chattanooga. This war has taken something from all of us, and, although your son seems to be the only casualty so far, know that we all share your pain. Your son did not die in vain. I shall persevere and make Stan and Kyle my slaves. Because I hate those guys. I hate them so very very much.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: The Confederate camp. The men relax and talk. Stan, Kyle, Grandpa, and Larsen sneak in...

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: There, you see? We take the s'more schnapps, and by morning they're all gonna wanna go home.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Nice thinkin', Billy.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Let's go.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Where to next, General?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Where did the Confederates go, son?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Well, I guess uh Fort Sumter in South Carolina. That's where the Civil War really escalated.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Ah, splendid. Then to Fort Sumter we shall go.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Welluh, that sounds great. I'm gonna get some s'more schnapps. You want anything?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah. Can I get some of those animal cookies? Those frosty ones with the sprinkles on 'em.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Um, sure.  What the-? Ey, where's the s'more schnapps?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: We're out of s'more schnapps?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: That can't be.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I guess we drank it all.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Now what?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Now we just wait until morning. Check-mate, Cartman. Pretty soon, you're gonna be our slave.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Uugh.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Ouch.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Oh, my head.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Where am I?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Ned, I think I can say without any doubt that that was the longest drinking binge we've ever had.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Mmm-oh. Gmm-oh, my head.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Oh no, I'm supposed to be at work today.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Me, too.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Well, come on everybody. We've got to get to the nearest bus station, quick.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Where are you going?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: We're goin' home kid. Come on.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: We can't go home, we have to take Fort Sumter!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Uh, the only thing we have to do is get home before our wives leave us.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: No! What about the Confederasuh?! What about freedom?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Haha! You lose, fatass!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: God, I hate you guys!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah, but you know? I think you've learned something today. You've learned that you can't rewrite history.  You see, history is forever,  and everything happens for a reason.  Sure, you can try and change the past, but usually you kno-

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Where are you going?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: This isn't over! Oh no! Oh no, not by a long shot!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: The long march home... The group is in a meadow.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Ogh. I don't believe we came all the way out here.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah? Well, I don't think the bus station is too far from here.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Uh, how much do you think a bus ticket back to Colorado is gonna run?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Allo, I am Suzette, the S'more Schnapps girl.  We are pleased to sponsor you with all the S'more Schnapps you need.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Awgh, I can't drink anymore of that stuff.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Me neither.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Uh uh come uh, come on, guys. Just one little drink. Uh a toast to how far you came and all that you saw.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yes, please. Do a shot out of my breasts.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Well, uh I guhess one little cheers is in order.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Soon, the men are drunk again and having a good time.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hey, look! Ned's doin' his trick again!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hey, guys. Let's all play a game of "grab ass."

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: What's "grab ass?"

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: You know. We just run around in circles and try to grab each other's asses.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Ey, that sounds fun.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hohoho.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I got you. Oo-oh.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Gentlemen! I hate to break up the party, but I believe we have a fort to take.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: You heard the General.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Oh, no.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: We'll never stop them now.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: The March of War. Chattanooga, Tennessee, is struck, then Atlanta, Georgia; then eastern and southeastern Alabama, then Orlando, Florida. The group is on a log ride

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Woohoo!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yes! Yes!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Southeast Georgia is struck, then Darling County, South Carolina.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Fort Sumter, day. A tour is taking place.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Throughout 1861 the Confederate authorities tried to drive out the Union occupants of Fort Sumter peacefully. But Abraham Lincoln's administration would not surrender the fort to the Confederates, so Jefferson Davis decided to take action.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: And the Confederates won the fort?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yes.  Imagine what it must have been like: you're a Union soldier stationed at this fort, and one day, you look out and see thousands of Confederates ready to pounce on you.  Uh...

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Take the fort!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Charge!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah!  Woohoo, yeah, come on!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: We got it! The fort is ours!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: What was that??

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Attention political activists: you are on government historical document property! Surrender the document with your hands up! If you would like a tour of the fort, one can be arranged through the South Carolina Chamber of Commerce.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Give up, fatass! There's over a hundred National Guards down here.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Suck my ass!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: What do we do, General? We're outnumbered.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: We asked the State of South Carlina for recruits. The reenforcements are bound to show up.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Alright, that does it. Blow the whole thing up.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: No, you can't do that. Our dads are there.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Sorry, son. We tried it your way; now we do it our way. Prepare the mortar.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hold it right there!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Wow, look at that! The entire state of South Carolina showed up!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I knew they would!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Aw, damnit!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: We're ready to fight with ya. Long live the Confederacy!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yee-haw! All right!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Now our numbers are truly great. It is time. It is time to march to Washington D.C.!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: WASHINGTON D.C., 7 45 A.M., next day. The group has entered the city and are protesting outside the white house. The Million Confederate March?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hey, government! You can't ignore our anguished cries anymore! You hear that?! You Government?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Oh boy, this doesn't look good.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: the three men turn away from the window

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: It's just like the Million Man March, except that there actually are a million people.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Mr. President! A message for you from the extremists!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Dear Mr. President:

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
role: There are times when humans can no longer endure their government's
text: authoritah. You must declare the Confederaceh its own nation so that we may enter into a new millennium of prosperitah. If you do not meet our demands, we will be forced to show the videotapes we have of you with Marisa Tomei.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Oh, dear God! Wuh-we have to meet their demands.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: What?? Sir, there's- there's not that many of them.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: As Vice-Persident, I think we'd better give them what they want. It's just the Southern states; who really needs them?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: My hands are tied. Tell General Lee that I'll meet him in front of the Capitol.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Sir!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I'm so glad I don't have your job.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: back outside in the raucous crowd

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Dude, let's just give up right now and accept that we have to be Cartman's slaves.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Damnit, Billy, this isn't about you havin' to be slaves! This is about history! We can't let them change it!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Well, we've tried everything, Grandpa. What else can we do?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Wait a munute! They're all still doing a reenactment. What we have to do is play into that. Come on, Billy. You boys need a quick history lesson!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: The Capitol, later. President Clinton is at a table on the Capitol with Gore and others

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: All right, I'm gonna sign the document declarin' the Confederacy winners of the Civil War.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hooray!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Boy, we really got the President by the balls. Good thing you have that videotape of him and Marisa Tomei.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: I don't. I made it up.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hey! Who's that?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hello. I'm Abraham Lincoln, President of the United States.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yes, and I'm Jefferson Davis, President of the Confederacy.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Boy, this just keeps getting weirder, doesn't it?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: What the hell are you guys doing?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Ey, General, he's reenacting Jefferson Davis! You can't talk that way to a superior officer!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Men, I want you all to know that as President of the Confederacy, I am hereby surrendering.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: What?!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Well, as Abraham Lincoln, I accept your surrender, and agree to your conditions. You and all the Confederates will have all the S'more Schnapps you can drink for a year.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Wow!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: A whole year?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: All right! Well, I think we got what we wanted.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: That's it? I-I don't have to sign this thing?

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hey, come on. We should take a tour of the Smithsonian before we head back.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: No! We still have to fight!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Lincoln and Davis signed the treaty, General. The war is over.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: NOOO!!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: It's finally over, Cartman. You lost!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah. And now you can stake that stupid beard off!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA-  -AAAH!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Boys, as President of the United States, I want to commend you for stopping the rebel uprising.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Don't touch me.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Well Cartman, the South lost! That mean you're our slave for a month!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Damnit! Damnit, I was so close! Damnit!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Now, the first thing I want you to do for us is-

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Wait a minute! I don't have to be your slave.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: What??

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: The North still won the Civil War! That means slavery is abolished!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Eh, he's right, boys. Slavery is illegal and immoral, partially in thanks to the North winning the Civil War.

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Awwww!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Hahahaha haa ha!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Aw, the hell with it. Let's go home. Thanks a lot, Bill Clinton!

title: THE RED BADGE OF GAYNESS
text: Yeah. Thanks, dick!
